snippet: The only lawmaker ever expelled from the Nevada Legislature agreed Thursday to plead guilty in two Las Vegas criminal cases dating to the days before the 2013 legislative session, in a bid to get out of jail and into a mental health program....

headline.print_headline: Ex-Nevada Lawmaker Taking Plea Deal in Vegas Cases
headline.main: Ex-Nevada Lawmaker Taking Plea Deal in Vegas Cases

lead_paragraph: The only lawmaker ever expelled from the Nevada Legislature agreed Thursday to plead guilty in two Las Vegas criminal cases dating to the days before the 2013 legislative session, in a bid to get out of jail and into a mental health program.
